1079834213229113345.Title: Hold the Dark
1079834213229113345.Text: My favourite movie of 2018 was Annihilation, but I also really loved Hold the Dark . There's something in the tone of that movie that really captures what it's like to live in a cold climate, and what that cold might do to people.
